walmart.title: Security Mapping Before Procurement
walmart.author: Avery Kim
walmart.story: At Walmart, we ran a joint architecture and security workshop around merchandising and inventory systems before formal sourcing started. Pulling controls and data-handling decisions into discovery removed late redlines and kept the deal moving.

walmart.title: Pilot KPI Proof Unlocked Budget
walmart.author: Jordan Patel
walmart.story: The pilot focused on store operations and replenishment. We agreed on one KPI (on-shelf availability) with the champion and finance lead, then published weekly outcomes. The measurable lift gave the economic buyer enough confidence to release expansion budget.

walmart.title: Buying Committee Alignment Closed the Deal
walmart.author: Samira Reed
walmart.story: Before procurement kicked off, we aligned legal, security, finance, and operations on ownership, rollout sequencing, and support model for merchandising and inventory systems. That avoided an end-of-cycle stall and helped close the agreement for Walmart.

amazon.title: Buying Committee Alignment Closed the Deal
amazon.author: Marcus Lee
